definition: to follow/to comply with/varying according to.../to allow/subsequently

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

sentences.english: Cissokho's entourage are also in Milan and they are concerned.
sentences.chinese: 西索霍的随行人员也一直米兰，他们对此忧心忡忡。

sentences.english: He discover two same, so he ask retinue .
sentences.chinese: 他发现两个相同的，所以他要求随行人员。

sentences.english: The party entered holy Benares by boat along the Ganges .
sentences.chinese: 随行人员乘小舟延着恒河进入神圣的贝拿勒斯。

definition: to receive (a visitor)/to admit (allow sb to enter)
to receive sb/to grant an interview
to lead a group/leader of a group/captain (of sports squad)
to stay (at a hotel etc during a trip)
to entertain (for dinner)/to invite to dinner
